All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an administrator in the system.
AdminFactory
Factory class for creating Admin instances.
AdminRepository
Repository interface for managing Admin entities.
AlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to create or add an entity that already exists in the system.
ApplicationConfig
Configuration class for application-wide beans and settings.
ApplicationSecurityConfig
Configuration class for application security.
Appointment
Represents a veterinary appointment that includes details such as reason, date, time, associated patient and veterinarian, and the list of pets involved in the appointment.
AppointmentController
REST controller for managing appointment-related operations.
AppointmentDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing appointment details.
AppointmentRepository
Repository interface for managing Appointment entities.
AppointmentService
Service class for managing appointments.
AppointmentStatus
Represents the various statuses an appointment can have throughout its lifecycle.
AppointmentStatusUpdater
Scheduler component for automating the update of appointment statuses.
AppointmentUpdateRequest
Request object for updating appointment details.
AuthController
REST controller for managing authentication and authorization operations.
AuthTokenFilter
JWT Authentication filter that processes each request to validate the JWT token and set the authentication context for the request.
BookAppointmentRequest
Request object for booking a new appointment.
ChangePasswordRequest
Request object for changing a user's password.
ChangePasswordService
Service implementation for handling user password changes.
CustomApiResponse
Represents a standardized response structure for API endpoints.
DefaultDataInitializer
Initializes default roles and user accounts in the application upon startup.
EmailProperties
Configuration properties for email settings.
EmailService
Service for sending email notifications.
EmailValidator
Utility class for validating email addresses against a predefined set of domains.
EntityConverter<T,D>
A utility class for converting entities to their corresponding DTO (Data Transfer Object) representations.
FeedBackMessage
A utility class containing predefined feedback messages used throughout the application.

Service interface for managing appointments.

Interface for the service handling user password changes.

Interface defining the contract for password reset operations.

Interface for managing pet-related operations.

Interface for managing photo-related operations.

Interface for managing reviews in the application.

IVetBiographyService
Interface for veterinarian biography management.
IVeterinarianService
Interface for Veterinarian service, providing methods for managing and retrieving veterinarian-related data.
JwtAuthEntryPoint
Custom entry point for handling unauthorized access in JWT authentication.
JwtResponse
Represents the response containing a JWT (JSON Web Token) and user ID.
JwtUtils
Utility class for generating, parsing, and validating JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
LoginRequest
Request object for user login.
NameValidator
Utility class for validating and formatting names.
PasswordResetRequest
Request object for resetting a user's password.
PasswordResetService
Service layer for managing password reset operations.
PasswordValidator
Utility class for validating passwords.

Pet
Represents a pet entity associated with a veterinary appointment.
PetCareAppointmentApplication
Pet Care Appointment Application.
PetController
REST controller for managing pets.
PetDeletionNotAllowedException
Exception thrown when an attempt to delete a pet is not allowed.

Repository interface for managing Pet entities.
PetService
Service class for managing Pet entities.
PhoneValidator
Utility class for validating phone numbers.
Photo
Represents a photo entity used to store image data associated with users or other entities.
PhotoController
This controller handles CRUD operations for user photos.
PhotoRepository
Repository interface for managing Photo entities.
PhotoService
Service implementation for managing photo-related operations.

Configuration class for RabbitMQ setup.

RabbitMQ message consumer for handling various event-driven tasks.
RabbitMQProducer
RabbitMQ message producer for publishing messages to a specified exchange.

Request object for registering a new user.
ResourceNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested resource is not found.

User
Represents a user in the Pet Care Appointment system.
UserAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to register a user that already exists in the system.
